price: 42. Mabe ezuaka yango sikoyo te(1), to sima na yango te, ewuti epai ya oyo azali bwanya atonda lokumu.
arabic: لَّا يَأۡتِيهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَلَا مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦۖ تَنزِيلٞ مِّنۡ حَكِيمٍ حَمِيدٖ
footnotes: 1 Mabe ezuaka yango te: Elingi koloba: Mbeba ezuaka yango te, ezala liboso to sima

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā yatīhi al-bāṭilu min bayni yadayhi walā min khalfihi tanzīlun min ḥakīmin ḥamīdin
